thread.title: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to meet CEOs of Google, Apple, Microsoft, and Tesla
thread.title_full: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to meet CEOs of Google, Apple, Microsoft, and Tesla - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Prime Minister Narendra Modi to meet CEOs of Google, Apple, Microsoft, and Tesla
text: Innovation, entrepreneurship, technology and renewable energy would be the focus of Prime Minister Narendra Modi during his visit to Silicon Valley over the weekend where he will meet CEOs of top American companies like Apple, Microsoft, Google and Tesla. On the first day of his arrival in Silicon Valley on September 26, Modi would visit the campus of iconic Tesla where he would be welcomed by its CEO Elon Musk. Modi would have a look at some of their path breaking inventions, particularly in the renewable energy sector. ”One of the important interests in Tesla is in battery technology because it has implications on in terms of storage and renewable energy,” Indian Ambassador Arun K Singh said. Later, Modi would have one-on-one meeting »
